prompt:
You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Trucy Wright
Description: A particular set of circumstances led to her being adopted by Mr. Wright. A world-class magician on the rise.
Character 1
Name: Athena Cykes
Description: The youngest lawyer in our agency. She apparently studied psychology in Europe.
Character 2
Name: Phoenix Wright
Description: My boss. He taught me a lot about what it means to be a lawyer.
Character 3
Name: Nahyuta Sahdmadhi
Description: A prosecutor from Khura'in. He's also a monk, which explains why he's known as the "Last Rites Prosecutor."
Character 4
Name: Dhurke Sahdmadhi
Description: Leader of the Defiant Dragons, and the man who raised me. He was a lawyer once.
Character 5
Name: Archie Buff
Description: An archeologist in Kurain Village. He was asked by someone to study the Founder's Orb.
Character 6
Name: Datz Are'bal
Description: A member of the Defiant Dragons, and Dhurke's right-hand man. He's always been one to laugh at just about anything.
Character 7
Name: Ema Skye
Description: A detective. It looks like she finally became the forensics investigator she always wanted to be.
Character 8
Name: Paul Atishon
Description: He's looking to represent Kurain Village. His remarkable self-confidence is blinding.
Character 9
Name: Sergeant Buff → Armie Buff
Description: The doctor's reclusive child. He lost his mother in a fire.
Character 10
Name: Pearl Fey
Description: Ms. Maya Fey's cousin. She's also one of Kurain Village's spirit mediums. She's always really courteous.
Character 11
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: Mr. Wright's best friend and the district's chief prosecutor. His frilly cravat makes a strong fashion statement.
Character 12
Name: Maya Fey
Description: Mr. Wright's former assistant. She's currently training in Khura'in. I'm told she can channel the dead.
Character 13
Name: Inga Karkhuul Khura'in
Description: Khura'in's Minister of Justice and the kingdom's second-in-command.
Character 14
Name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
Description: Daughter of Ga'ran and princess of Khura'in who is more than a little spoiled.
Character 15
Name: Ga'ran Sigatar Khura'in
Description: The grand priestess and queen of Khura'in. It's said that she can channel the dead.
Character 16
Name: Nayna
Description: Rayfa's attendant. She disappeared all of a sudden after Minister Inga's death.
Character 17
Name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
Description: When not undergoing monastic training, this plucky kid works as a tour guide.
Character 18
Name: Amara Sigatar Khura'in
Description: The previous queen. She is a spirit medium known as the grand priestess and possesses incredible spiritual power.
Character 19
Name: Trucy Wright
Description: An aspiring magician and my daughter. I adopted her nine years ago.
Character 20
Name: Athena Cykes
Description: The newest lawyer in my office with a background in psychology.
Character 21
Name: Apollo Justice
Description: A reliable subordinate at my office. Serious and hot-blooded with vocal chords made of steel.
Character 22
Name: Nahyuta Sahdmadhi
Description: A Khura'inese prosecutor and monk. He's also known as the "Last Rites Prosecutor."
Character 23
Name: Dhurke Sahdmadhi
Description: Leader of the Defiant Dragons and Apollo's adoptive father.
Character 24
Name: Datz Are'bal
Description: The Defiant Dragons' XO and Dhurke's right-hand man. He will laugh at just about anything.
Character 25
Name: Ema Skye
Description: A detective with a love of science. She's finally achieved her dream of becoming a forensics investigator.
Character 26
Name: Miles Edgeworth
Description: The district's chief prosecutor and my childhood friend. We used to go head-to-head back in his courtroom days.
Character 27
Name: Maya Fey
Description: A practitioner of the Kurain Channeling Technique. We used to take on all sorts of cases together.
Character 28
Name: Inga Karkhuul Khura'in
Description: Khura'in's Minister of Justice. He was killed during the hostage exchange.
Character 29
Name: Rayfa Padma Khura'in
Description: A Khura'inist priestess and crown princess of Khura'in. Her Divination Séances show the last memories of the dead.
Character 30
Name: Ga'ran Sigatar Khura'in
Description: The grand priestess and queen of Khura'in. It's said that she can channel the dead.
Character 31
Name: Nayna
Description: Rayfa's attendant. She disappeared all of a sudden after Minister Inga's death.
Character 32
Name: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
Description: When not undergoing monastic training, this plucky kid works as a tour guide.
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: My beloved attorney's badge. Wearing it gets me raring to go.
Evidence 1
Name: Founder's Orb
Description: A national treasure of the Kingdom of Khura'in. None but those of in the royal family have laid eyes on it. Heating the Founder's Orb revealed the statue within. The founder's form has appeared from within. It seems only the queen knows the founder's real name.
Evidence 2
Name: Photo of My Father
Description: A picture of my biological father, Jove Justice, who died in Khura'in.
Evidence 3
Name: Study Photo
Description: Atishon saw Datz fleeing the scene the night of the murder. One of the books is stained with coffee. [caption] The victim is lying in the study next to floor-to-ceiling windows with clear glass. He is covered by books.
Evidence 4
Name: Study Diagram
Description: A diagram of the doctors's study. Note the bookcase, large window, and second-floor area. [caption] There is a tree outside the large floor-to-ceiling window. On the other side of the window is the bookshelf.
Evidence 5
Name: Research Notes
Description: Research notes on the Song of Ceremony and the box containing the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 6
Name: Orb Transfer Agreement
Description: States: "I agree to hand over the Founder's Orb to the Defiant Dragons if I will come to no harm."
Evidence 7
Name: Sarge's Drone
Description: A helicopter drone operated by the doctor's kid. Equipped with a camera and a microphone.
Evidence 8
Name: Glowing Moss
Description: Stuck to the insole of the doctor's boot. It probably got there when he went to hide the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 9
Name: E-Mail
Description: Data obtained from the doctor's computer. Includes a report on his research into the Founder's Orb. Found on the computer in Archie Buff's study, it was sent from Buff to "PAW-711@nmail" as a reply to an earlier email concerning his research into the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 10
Name: Doctor's Reading Glasses
Description: The doctor's poor eyesight meant he couldn't read anything without these. They were found on his desk.
Evidence 11
Name: Raincoat
Description: Seems the doctor wore this last night. Bears a distinctive yellow and green two-tone design.
Evidence 12
Name: Robbery Report
Description: A report filed a year ago by one Mr. Paul Atishon-Wimperson for the theft of the Crystal of Ami Fey.
Evidence 13
Name: Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report
Description: Dr. Buff was struck with the corner of some object. The time of death is between 10 and 11 PM.
Evidence 14
Name: Armie's Statement
Description: She'd fled to her room when she realized someone had moved her while she'd been unconscious on the second floor.
Evidence 15
Name: Inga's Autopsy Report
Description: Stabbed from behind. Cause of death is blood loss. Time of death is approximately 3 PM.
Evidence 16
Name: Tomb Diagram
Description: A diagram of the crime scene. Amara's sarcophagus is in the very center of the room.
Evidence 17
Name: Tomb Crime Photo
Description: A photo of Inga's body. He was stabbed in the back with a knife.
Evidence 18
Name: Gemstone
Description: Inga's button, discovered in the ashes of the tomb's incense burners. Caked in soot.
Evidence 19
Name: Pink Butterfly Pendant
Description: A pendant adorned with a pink butterfly. Seems it belongs to Dhurke. Stained with the victim's blood. A locket found at the crime scene. It actually belongs to Amara.
Evidence 20
Name: Mysterious Bloodstain
Description: A bloodstain from Amara's Tomb. Analysis reveals that it's Dhurke's blood.
Evidence 21
Name: Painkiller Shots
Description: The medication Inga used for his back pain. Said to make the pain disappear.
Evidence 22
Name: Inga's Notepad
Description: A notepad used by Inga. People's characteristics are written inside.
Evidence 23
Name: Woman's Photo
Description: A photo showing Dhurke and Amara's life on the run about 23 years ago.
Evidence 24
Name: Channeling Photo
Description: A picture taken at around 2 PM of the channeling rite.
Evidence 25
Name: Ahlbi's Statement
Description: At around 2 PM, Shah'do was surprised by a firecracker, ran into the courtyard, and stole Nayna's hat.
Evidence 26
Name: Amara's Assassination File
Description: A file containing a ton of info on the assassination of Amara Sigatar Khura'in.
Evidence 27
Name: Dhurke's Law Book
Description: A document establishing the Defense Culpability Act in the name of the queen.
Evidence 28
Name: Dhurke's Badge
Description: The symbol of Dhurke's creed: "A dragon never yields." Nahyuta never confiscated it.
Evidence 29
Name: Dhurke's Corpse Photo
Description: More than three days have passed since his death death. He was shot three times in the chest.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: The police have had their eye on Dr. Buff for some time.
Person: Ema
Testimony 1
Testimony: And just today, a number of stolen artifacts were discovered in his study.
Person: Ema
Testimony 2
Testimony: Among them were a priceless urn and a statue that were stolen from the Fey clan.
Person: Ema
Testimony 3
Testimony: It seems the doctor would do anything to study artifacts, including steal them.
Person: Ema
Testimony 4
Testimony: As for the relic at the center of this dispute, he likely stole it from the Atishon residence.
Person: Ema

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
Okay, so I'm trying to figure out which evidence and testimony contradict each other in this case. Let me go through the information step by step.

First, I'll look at the evidence provided. Evidence 0 is the Attorney's Badge, which is just a standard item and doesn't seem relevant here. Evidence 1 is the Founder's Orb, a national treasure of Khura'in. It mentions that only the royal family has seen it, and heating it revealed a statue inside. The founder's form appeared, and only the queen knows the founder's real name. This suggests that the orb is significant and its handling is restricted.

Looking at the testimonies, Testimony 4 from Ema Skye states that the doctor likely stole the relic from the Atishon residence. This implies that the doctor was involved in stealing the Founder's Orb or another relic.

Now, I need to see if any evidence contradicts this testimony. Evidence 1 says that the Founder's Orb is only accessible to the royal family, and its handling is restricted. If the doctor stole it, that would mean he had unauthorized access, which contradicts the evidence that only the royal family can handle it. Therefore, if the doctor stole it, he shouldn't have had access in the first place, which contradicts the evidence about the orb's restricted access.

So, the contradiction is between Evidence 1 and Testimony 4.
</think>

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
Alright, so I'm looking at this problem where I need to find a pair of evidence and testimony that contradict each other. The user has provided a list of characters, evidences, and testimonies. My task is to carefully analyze each piece of evidence and testimony to spot any contradictions.

First, I'll go through the evidence one by one to understand what each piece is about. Then, I'll do the same with the testimonies. Once I have a good grasp of each, I'll look for any discrepancies or contradictions between them.

Looking at the evidence, there's a lot here, but I'll focus on the ones that seem relevant. For example, Evidence 13 is the doctor's autopsy report, which states that Dr. Buff was struck with the corner of some object between 10 and 11 PM. Then, Testimony 5 from Atishon says he saw Datz Are'bal fleeing around 10 PM. This seems to align because if Atishon saw Datz fleeing around 10 PM, and the doctor's death was between 10 and 11 PM, it's possible that Datz was involved.

However, I need to check if there's any contradiction. Wait, Testimony 4 says that Atishon didn't know Dr. Buff was dead, which is why he didn't call the police. But if he saw Datz fleeing, which is linked to the doctor's death, shouldn't he have suspected something? That seems like a contradiction because if he saw someone fleeing, he might have guessed that something was wrong.

Another point is that Testimony 5 mentions that Atishon saw Datz fleeing around 10 PM, which is within the time frame of the doctor's death. But if Atishon didn't know the doctor was dead, how could he link Datz's fleeing to the crime? That seems inconsistent because witnessing someone fleeing after a crime usually raises suspicions.

So, putting this together, the contradiction lies in Testimony 4 and 5. Atishon claims he didn't know the doctor was dead, yet he saw Datz fleeing around the time of the murder, which should have made him suspicious enough to call the police. Therefore, these testimonies contradict each other regarding his knowledge of the crime and his actions afterward.

Now, looking back at the evidence, Evidence 13 supports the timeline of the doctor's death, and Testimony 5 supports the sighting of Datz. However, Testimony 4 contradicts the logical conclusion that witnessing a fleeing suspect would lead to reporting the crime.

Thus, the pair that contradicts is Testimony 4 and Testimony 5, but since the user wants an evidence and testimony pair, I need to see if any evidence directly contradicts a testimony. 

Wait, actually, Testimony 4 says Atishon didn't know the doctor was dead, but the fact that he saw Datz fleeing (Testimony 5) should have made him aware that something was wrong. This inconsistency suggests that Testimony 4 is contradicted by the implication of Testimony 5.

But in the format requested, I need to pair an evidence with a testimony. Looking again, perhaps Evidence 13 (autopsy report) and Testimony 4 (Atishon's claim of ignorance) don't directly contradict, but Testimony 5 does imply knowledge.

Alternatively, maybe Evidence 13 and Testimony 4 don't directly conflict, but Testimony 4 and 5 together create the contradiction. Since the user wants one pair, I'll settle on the most direct contradiction, which is between Testimony 4 and the implication of Testimony 5, but since I need to pick one evidence and one testimony, perhaps Evidence 13 and Testimony 4 don't directly conflict, but Testimony 4 and 5 do.

However, following the user's previous examples, they often paired an evidence with a testimony. So, considering that, I'll go with the pair that best fits the contradiction as per the user's expected answer.
</think>

Name: Founder's Orb
Description: A national treasure of the Kingdom of Khura'in. None but those of in the royal family have laid eyes on it. Heating the Founder's Orb revealed the statue within. The founder's form has appeared from within. It seems only the queen knows the founder's real name.
Evidence 2
Name: Photo of My Father
Description: A picture of my biological father, Jove Justice, who died in Khura'in.
Evidence 3
Name: Study Photo
Description: Atishon saw Datz fleeing the scene the night of the murder. One of the books is stained with coffee. [caption] The victim is lying in the study next to floor-to-ceiling windows with clear glass. He is covered by books.
Evidence 4
Name: Study Diagram
Description: A diagram of the doctors's study. Note the bookcase, large window, and second-floor area. [caption] There is a tree outside the large floor-to-ceiling window. On the other side of the window is the bookshelf.
Evidence 5
Name: Research Notes
Description: Research notes on the Song of Ceremony and the box containing the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 6
Name: Orb Transfer Agreement
Description: States: "I agree to hand over the Founder's Orb to the Defiant Dragons if I will come to no harm."
Evidence 7
Name: Sarge's Drone
Description: A helicopter drone operated by the doctor's kid. Equipped with a camera and a microphone.
Evidence 8
Name: Glowing Moss
Description: Stuck to the insole of the doctor's boot. It probably got there when he went to hide the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 9
Name: E-Mail
Description: Data obtained from the doctor's computer. Includes a report on his research into the Founder's Orb. Found on the computer in Archie Buff's study, it was sent from Buff to "PAW-711@nmail" as a reply to an earlier email concerning his research into the Founder's Orb.
Evidence 10
Name: Doctor's Reading Glasses
Description: The doctor's poor eyesight meant he couldn't read anything without these. They were found on his desk.
Evidence 11
Name: Raincoat
Description: Seems the doctor wore this last night. Bears a distinctive yellow and green two-tone design.
Evidence 12
Name: Robbery Report
Description: A report filed a year ago by one Mr. Paul Atishon-Wimperson for the theft of the Crystal of Ami Fey.
Evidence 13
Name: Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report
Description: Dr. Buff was struck with the corner of some object. The time of death is between 10 and 11 PM.
Evidence 14
Name: Armie's Statement
Description: She'd fled to her room when she realized someone had moved her while she'd been unconscious on the second floor.
Evidence 15
Name: Inga's Autopsy Report
Description: Stabbed from behind. Cause of death is blood loss. Time of death is approximately 3 PM.
Evidence 16
Name: Tomb Diagram
Description: A diagram of the crime scene. Amara's sarcophagus is in the very center of the room.
Evidence 17
Name: Tomb Crime Photo
Description: A photo of Inga's body. He was stabbed in the back with a knife.
Evidence 18
Name: Gemstone
Description: Inga's button, discovered in the ashes of the tomb's incense burners. Caked in soot.
Evidence 19
Name: Pink Butterfly Pendant
Description: A pendant adorned with a pink butterfly. Seems it belongs to Dhurke. Stained with the victim's blood. A locket found at the crime scene. It actually belongs to Amara.
Evidence 20
Name: Mysterious Bloodstain
Description: A bloodstain from Amara's Tomb. Analysis reveals that it's Dhurke's blood.
Evidence 21
Name: Painkiller Shots
Description: The medication Inga used for his back pain. Said to make the pain disappear.
Evidence 22
Name: Inga's Notepad
Description: A notepad used by Inga. People's characteristics are written inside.
Evidence 23
Name: Woman's Photo
Description: A photo showing Dhurke and Amara's life on the run about 23 years ago.
Evidence 24
Name: Channeling Photo
Description: A picture taken at around 2 PM of the channeling rite.
Evidence 25
Name: Ahlbi's Statement
Description: At around 2 PM, Shah'do was surprised by a firecracker, ran into the courtyard, and stole Nayna's hat.
Evidence 26
Name: Amara's Assassination File
Description: A file containing a ton of info on the assassination of Amara Sigatar Khura'in.
Evidence 27
Name: Dhurke's Law Book
Description: A document establishing the Defense Culpability Act in the name of the queen.
Evidence 28
Name: Dhurke's Badge
Description: The symbol of Dhurke's creed: "A dragon never yields." Nahyuta never confiscated it.
Evidence 29
Name: Dhurke's Corpse Photo
Description: More than three days have passed since his death death. He was shot three times in the chest.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: Papa met with someone the night he died.
Person: Sarge
Testimony 1
Testimony: I didn't have eyes on the ground, as I'd already mounted my siege defense, but...
Person: Sarge
Testimony 2
Testimony: ...I did hear him arguing with someone in his study!
Person: Sarge
Testimony 3
Testimony: From my window, I saw the one designated "Datz" getting ejected from the premises.
Person: Sarge
Testimony 4
Testimony: After that, the man lingered around the perimeter for some time.
Person: Sarge
Testimony 5
Testimony: He must have regrouped and killed my papa in the study later -- I just know it!
Person: Sarge

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
Okay, let's try to figure out which evidence and testimony contradict each other in this case. So, the user has provided a list of characters, evidences, and testimonies. My task is to identify one pair where an evidence and a testimony contradict each other.

First, I'll go through each evidence and testimony to understand what they say.

Looking at the testimonies, Testimony 0 from Sarge mentions that Papa (Dr. Buff) met with someone the night he died. Testimony 1 says Sarge didn't have eyes on the ground but heard an argument in the study. Testimony 2 confirms that Datz was ejected from the premises. Testimony 3 mentions seeing Datz lingering around the perimeter, and Testimony 4 says Datz must have regrouped and killed Dr. Buff.

Now, looking at the evidences, Evidence 3 is the Study Photo which shows Datz fleeing the scene. Evidence 4 is the Study Diagram, which details the layout of the study, including the bookcase, window, and second-floor area. Evidence 5 includes Research Notes on the Song of Ceremony and the Founder's Orb. Evidence 6 is the Orb Transfer Agreement. Evidence 7 is Sarge's Drone, which was used by the doctor's kid. Evidence 8 is Glowing Moss found on the doctor's boot. Evidence 9 is an email from Dr. Buff's computer. Evidence 10 are the doctor's reading glasses. Evidence 11 is the doctor's raincoat. Evidence 12 is a Robbery Report from a year ago. Evidence 13 is Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report, stating he was struck with an object between 10 and 11 PM.

Now, focusing on the key points: Testimony 4 says Datz lingered around the perimeter after being ejected, implying he had time to regroup and commit the murder. However, Evidence 13's Autopsy Report states the time of death was between 10 and 11 PM. If Datz was ejected and then lingered, the timeline might not align with the autopsy report's time frame.

Wait, but the autopsy report's time frame is between 10 and 11 PM, which could overlap with when Datz was lingering. So, perhaps there's no direct contradiction. Alternatively, maybe the Study Diagram (Evidence 4) shows that the window and bookshelf block the view, contradicting Sarge's testimony of seeing Datz from her window.

Yes, that makes sense. Testimony 3 says Sarge saw Datz from her window, but Evidence 4's Study Diagram indicates that the window and bookshelf block the view, making it impossible for her to have seen Datz as described. Therefore, these two contradict each other.
</think>

cot:
Okay, so I'm trying to figure out which evidence and testimony contradict each other in this case. Let me start by going through the evidence and testimonies one by one.

First, looking at the evidence:

- **Evidence 0**: Attorney's Badge. This is just a badge, probably not relevant here.
- **Evidence 1**: Founder's Orb. It's a national treasure, but I don't see how this directly relates to the testimony yet.
- **Evidence 2**: Photo of My Father. This seems personal and not related to the current case.
- **Evidence 3**: Study Photo. This shows the doctor's study with the victim covered by books and a stained coffee book. It mentions that Atishon saw Datz fleeing.
- **Evidence 4**: Study Diagram. This is a diagram of the study, noting the bookcase, window, and second-floor area. It also mentions a tree outside the window and the bookshelf on the other side.
- **Evidence 5**: Research Notes. These are notes on the Song of Ceremony and the Founder's Orb, which might be relevant but not directly contradictory.
- **Evidence 6**: Orb Transfer Agreement. This is about transferring the Founder's Orb, not directly related to the testimony.
- **Evidence 7**: Sarge's Drone. A drone with a camera and microphone, possibly used to record something.
- **Evidence 8**: Glowing Moss. Found on the doctor's boot, suggesting he was near theFounder's Orb.
- **Evidence 9**: E-Mail. Research into the Founder's Orb, but again, not directly contradictory.
- **Evidence 10**: Doctor's Reading Glasses. Found on the desk, not relevant to the testimony.
- **Evidence 11**: Raincoat. The doctor wore it last night, distinctive design.
- **Evidence 12**: Robbery Report. About a year-old theft, not directly related.
- **Evidence 13**: Dr. Buff's Autopsy Report. Time of death between 10-11 PM, struck with an object.
- **Evidence 14**: Armie's Statement. She fled when someone moved her while unconscious on the second floor.
- **Evidence 15**: Inga's Autopsy Report. Stabbed from behind, time of death around 3 PM.
- **Evidence 16**: Tomb Diagram. Diagram of Amara's tomb.
- **Evidence 17**: Tomb Crime Photo. Shows Inga's body stabbed in the back.
- **Evidence 18**: Gemstone. Inga's button found in incense burners.
- **Evidence 19**: Pink Butterfly Pendant. Belongs to Amara, stained with blood.
- **Evidence 20**: Mysterious Bloodstain. Dhurke's blood in Amara's Tomb.
- **Evidence 21**: Painkiller Shots. Inga's medication.
- **Evidence 22**: Inga's Notepad. Characteristics of people.
- **Evidence 23**: Woman's Photo. Dhurke and Amara 23 years ago.
- **Evidence 24**: Channeling Photo. Taken around 2 PM.
- **Evidence 25**: Ahlbi's Statement. Shah'do stole Nayna's hat.
- **Evidence 26**: Amara's Assassination File. Info on her assassination.
- **Evidence 27**: Dhurke's Law Book. About Defense Culpability Act.
- **Evidence 28**: Dhurke's Badge. Symbol of his creed.
- **Evidence 29**: Dhurke's Corpse Photo. Shot three times in the chest.

Now, looking at the testimonies:

- **Testimony 0**: Atishon saw Datz fleeing the scene.
- **Testimony 1**: Atishon was under a tree when he saw Datz.
- **Testimony 2**: Datz was running out the front door.
- **Testimony 3**: Atishon didn't know Dr. Buff was dead.
- **Testimony 4**: Datz lingered around the perimeter.
- **Testimony 5**: Datz killed Dr. Buff.

I need to find a contradiction between evidence and testimony. Let's focus on the Study Diagram (Evidence 4) and Testimony 3.

**Evidence 4** says the study has a large window with a tree outside and a bookshelf on the other side. **Testimony 3** claims Atishon saw Datz from outside the study window. But if the window is blocked by the bookshelf, Atishon couldn't have seen inside. So, the evidence contradicts the testimony because the setup of the study makes it impossible for Atishon to have seen Datz from outside.
</think>
